detail.question: How is RightLife different from other wellness apps?
detail.answer: RightLife stands out by blending technology and content, offering unique features like diagnostics through facial & voice scans, health audit, mind audit, live classes, workshops, and a premium e-commerce section tailored to individual wellness needs.

detail.question: Can I customize my wellness journey or is it pre-defined?
detail.answer: RightLife crafts a personalized health journey based on diagnostics & user inputs. While there's a structure, there's ample room for personalization based on your preferences.

detail.question: How frequently should I use the app to see benefits?
detail.answer: While benefits can be noticed with occasional use, we recommend daily interaction for optimal results.

detail.question: Do I need a subscription to access all features?
detail.answer: Certain premium features and content require a subscription. However, many features are accessible in the free version of the app.

detail.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
detail.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from the 'Subscription' section in My Profile.

detail.question: Are there any trial periods available?
detail.answer: Yes, new users can enjoy a 14-day free trial of our premium features.

detail.question: What devices and OS versions is RightLife compatible with?
detail.answer: RightLife is compatible with both Android and iOS devices. We recommend keeping your OS updated for the best experience.

detail.question: I'm facing technical issues with the app. Who do I contact?
detail.answer: For technical support, please reach out to our team at [support@rightlife.com].

detail.question: How is my data used within the app?
detail.answer: Your data is primarily used to personalize your RightLife experience. We adhere to strict privacy standards, ensuring your data is never sold or shared without your consent. For more details, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

detail.question: What measures are in place to ensure my personal information is safe?
detail.answer: RightLife employs end-to-end encryption and stringent data protection measures in line with global standards to safeguard your information.

detail.question: Who are the experts or professionals behind the content?
detail.answer: RightLife collaborates with a diverse group of certified professionals, including nutritionists, fitness trainers, mental health experts, and more. Their expertise ensures the content we deliver is both accurate and beneficial.

detail.question: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
detail.answer: On the login page, click the "Forgot Password?" link. Enter the credentials associated with your RightLife account, and we'll send you an OTP to reset your password.
